title: SQL Server Connection - mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3228
author: KaveSys
body_snippet:
Hello,
I'm opening a new issue after fix the SQL Injection vulnerability in mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3228, an installation is not available and using the portable version, when try to attach a SQL Server Express database to share the connections with other people, mRemoteNG will stuck and is not possible to use it.

From the logs:

The SSL connection could not be established, see inner exception.
Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remo...

comments.snippet: I can confirm that connecting to MariaDB causes a freeze with this same error.
comments.author: 4pack

comments.snippet: I just had my new VPS upgraded so planning to test on coming weekend
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
Potential fix PR opened: #3110.

What changed:
- added explicit Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SNI and Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SNI.runtime references in mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG.csproj so native SNI assets are resolved and copied more predictably per platform build.

CI reference (fork validation, x86/x64/ARM64 green):
- https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/actions/runs/21785156992

If possible, please validate this PR build against the SQL Server scenario that reproduced the BadImageFormatEx...
comments.author: robertpopa22
